title: Mobile Language Project-Based Learning for Achieving the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs)

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Language learning enhancement and SDGs-linked practical project implementation in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize three or more linguistic expressions explaining interconnections among the 17 SDGs
Learners can implement community problem-solving ideas as language projects (podcasts/blogs, etc.) by applying design thinking stages
Learners can demonstrate critical thinking at least twice in the SDGs-linked language content creation process through PBL activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
